title: Clearing the Air: The Texas Hospitality on Indoor Air Quality

surveyQuestions.question: Hello, is this the owner/manager of?

followUp.action: I'm calling from Direct Impact, a national research firm. Is there a better time to reach?

surveyQuestions.question: I am calling from Direct Impact, a national research firm. This is not a sales call. I'd like to ask you some questions about indoor air quality in your establishment. This survey will only take a few moments of your time.

In the last 5 years, have you invested or are you currently planning to invest in indoor air quality improvements such as installing or replacing ventilation equipment, ductwork, or installing/upgrading air-cleaning filtration?
options: No, I have not invested and I'm not planning to invest

surveyQuestions.question: How much impact can good ventilation have on addressing smoking issues?
